existing_reels.title: 3 SAT Math Shortcuts You NEED to Know
existing_reels.script: Did you know most students waste 5 minutes per SAT math problem? Here are 3 shortcuts that'll save you HOURS on test day. Number 1: The back-solving trick. Instead of solving forward, plug in answer choices. Works 80% of the time. Number 2: The estimation hack. Round numbers to make mental math easier, then find the closest answer. Number 3: Skip and return. Hard problem? Mark it and move on. Your brain will work on it subconsciously. Save this for test day!
existing_reels.performance_notes: High save rate indicates valuable content
